评论详情: Color nice, way too loose for me but if you like large hanging off oversized top, lightweight this is for you
Love the oversize look. So comfy and looks great on me

This sweatshirt seemed nice and cozy and the material was thick but not scratchy.  Was very movable.  The only thing I did not like was the zippers were cold against my sides.  So you would have to wear an undershirt sho they didn’t rub your sides.  The color was nice and it was a little oversized.

This light weight sweatshirt is soooo soft and comfortable! I immediately purchased in other colors! True to size, looks great with legging and covers bottom! Great quality and very soft. Washes well.  Cute zippers
I ordered two of these. Black and the tan color. they are so soft and true to size , i ordered an XL and normally wear an XL.

评论概述: Not oversized at all! Also very cheap fabric.
评论详情: I am a huge fan of oversized sweatshirts and side zippers. This was not oversized, and it is not a sweatshirt. I have had a lot of luck with items marked “frequently returned,” but not this time. No matter how cheap it is, save your money and get a better version!

Purchased from Shea Whitney’s recommendation list: After 1 wear (about 3hrs ) I noticed it was piling in the front at my chest, after further inspection it was also piling at the right hip area and left shoulder. Took me a minute but then I realized it’s right where my crossbody purse lays (leather bag & guitar strap) Then I washed with like materials (did not dry) and noticed even more piling at the wrists and and underarm. I literally put this on went to my besties house to exchange gifts and went to the movies. I did not have my crossbody in this whole time. I wore it into the movies but took it off while in there and wore it out of the movies. So a total of 15 min tops. I’d return it if it weren’t past the 30day return window. I hate I didn’t wear it sooner but it until recently it hasn’t been that cold around here. Clothes these days all have polyester in them and I think that is what causes this piling. Anything I have that has polyester in it seems to pile. I have a sweater shaver I’ll have to use but who wants to have to use that after every wear. I finally gave up ironing but it seems like just to swap it out for sweater shaving! If you still want to buy inspire of the piling for reference I bought a large for an oversized look to wear w leggings and it was perfect for that look. A medium (what I normally wear) would have worked for a true fit look. Giving 2 stars because it fit just as I wanted it to and it is soft, comfy and WAS cute before the piling. I wear shave it, and wear again using a different bag. But there isn’t anything I can do about the wrists and underarm area. I’ll try to update if using a different strap helps.

评论概述: Permanent wrinkles and not iron able like tag says!
评论详情: This shirt was washed twice and the lines from the shrink packaging never went away, tag says iron on low heat tried that… nope permanent iron mark on the shirt with my irons lowest setting! Needless to say never worn and going in the trash! Very disappointing!!
Had a tear in torn in it. Will reorder. Nice fabric, ordered for granddaughter.
True to size. Nice color and soft fabric. The fabric is similar to thin fleece and cheaply made throw blanket. Returning it.

评论概述: Super soft but not as relaxed as photo
评论详情: The color of the sweatshirt was really nice. I got the blue. The fabric is super super soft. The zippers hit me right in the sides and when it’s cold out, you can really feel them. I thought from the picture that the shirt would fit looser than it does. Maybe some of it is due to my body weight. I kept the shirt and I will wear it but mostly on days where it’s not so cold.
Very comfortable shirt.  Beautiful green color with side zippers.  Adorable with leggings orjeans.  Warm and cozy.  Good quality and wash and wear

then it's going to cling, the zippers are useful for this area, because if you have thunder thighs, that would be me, then you probably have a slight tummy, it'll cling there too. For me, classic pear shape, it was large in the bust/shoulder area and sleeves. the Carmel color is truly as shown, nice and warm/earthy.  Like all other reviewers mentioned, soft and cozy, definitely can put a laying long sleeve underneath it. I needed to get something quick and cheap, this fit the bill, would I buy it again, no.

This wasn't sweatshirt material, it was more like a very thick tshirt but felt like polyester material. It also had an unflattering boxy fit. I'm 5ft 2, 150lbs, short torso.  Color matched the photo though.
This sweatshirt is so soft!  Love it, want to order more, you usually don’t find them this soft!
Seriously the softest shirt ever.  There was a loose stitch but nothing I can't fix.
Runs very small. Advertised as lightweight sweatshirt, but fabric is more like t-shirt jersey fabric. Thin and cheap.
A bit is a strange material. Not that warm, looks like velvet. Not sure yet if I like it
So very soft...feels like a cloud. The color was beautiful and so far it washes well.
I have the tan and black colors, love them with jeans or leggings!

评论概述: Nice material… not what I expected!
评论详情: It is more of a shirt that has sweatshirt qualities! The fabric was different than I expected more of a fleece/velvet feel. My purpose was to put a heat transfer vinyl design on it and couldn’t because it wasn’t as cotton as I was hoping. I was worried it was going to melt with the high heat applied but am still gifting it as a shirt!
This sweatshirt was light weight but fit a little smaller than expected.
The material is very soft and comfortable. Love the zippers on the side.
Wasn't the material I thought it would be, but it is really soft and velvety almost. Beautiful sweater.

Absolutely love these sweatshirts. Can dress up or down with them. I have it in the following colors: coffee, blue, light apricot and just ordered a pink. They are so soft and comfortable. They wash and wear very nicely. Love the zippers on the sides. Material isn’t too thick or thin. I normally wear a large but wanted a little baggy so ordered XL. Worked perfectly. I have worn with both leggings and jeans. Would recommend to anyone who is wanting a sweatshirt that is versatile and comfortable. Plan on buying more colors in the future. I am 5’4” and 185 lbs. I have very broad shoulders and have no problem with these shirts fitting.

The wrinkles from the packaging are REALLY hard to get out, even after putting it in the dryer and the inside of the side zippers aren’t covered so they constantly rub against your skin.  This was my second purchase of this sweatshirt and seems like the quality isn’t as good. The fit is true to size.
Very soft, very comfortable and true to size.  I wear this item very often!

The weight of the fabric is on the heavy side which is great for cool or cold days. The side zippers are attractive however COLD on chilly days.  That's easily remedied with a layered tee shirt. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase.  I plan to order other colors too.
Soft, fit excellent
I would size up a size or two if you truly want it oversized. I ordered my normal size large, sbd it fit like a normal large.

I bought the shadow blue color (not the correct name) and it is so soft! The zippers on the side make it a tad more cute and put together than a normal sweatshirt. I’m 5’, 160#, 38DD. I typically buy an xl because I worry about tops hugging my stomach and my boobs typically require an xl so it doesn’t look too tight, BUT not this shirt! With the zippers on the side, I wore a different color tank under it to show, leggings, and cute shoes. I felt like I really tried to look cute on a Sunday! :-) I’m buying more. So soft, cute, and I think the large is perfect. Buy it! Definitely one of my favorite clothing items from Amazon.
Very soft comfy material. I thought it was going to be more like a sweatshirt but it’s a thin material instead. Stretchy and nice material however.
I should have paid attention .  When Amazon  says, “frequently returned…”, I need to keeplooking.  Not at all the fabric selected in the photos  Just tacky.  Returned
This sweatshirt is so soft! Great for lounging or running errands. Love the zippers on the side. Not too thick but great for fall season outside or in the house.
I loved this top so much, I went back and ordered a 2nd color. It is very soft, fits tts, and I love zipper detail on the sides.

I absolutely love this item. I ordered purple / lilac size L. I toggle between L and XL typically but since this said oversized I went with a L. It fits fine, if I want it oversized, I would go up to an XL. I absolutely love the zipper detail and as the title says, it is so soft. It feels divine. It is lightweight which is stated in the description which I appreciate as a menopausal 53yo. Can easily be layered. I highly recommend this sweatshirt, especially for the price (bought it discounted, but would pay more)
I thought this was a sweatshirt but it is definitely just a shirt, not what I expected & I'll be returning. It is cute but it's not a sweatshirt by any means.
Hands down the winner for the winter. Lightweight and super cozy! Love how it zips on the sides too!

I’m so happy with my purchase. I ordered this for my MIL. Her favorite color is purple and I didn’t want just a plain purple sweatshirt. The zippers on the sides are so cute and add style to what might have been a boring sweatshirt. It’s so cozy and fits true to size. It’s just the right thickness without being too warm.

I have this sweater in four different colors. I know that sounds crazy. But this has to be the most comfortable sweater I’ve ever had. I have also gifted this sweater to my niece who’s pregnant. The zippers is so fun
Love how soft & comfortable this shirt is but it is an odd color - not burgundy so I will be returning

Loved till I washed it .don't like material.

Lightweight.  Same item ordered last year was made from a better and heavier fabric.

评论详情: This is after washing twice, steam pressing, using a wrinkle release product. It came vacuum packed!  Love it but can’t wear it to work looking like that.

评论概述: Super soft, beautiful color but permanently 'wrinkled'
评论详情: Love the shirt! It's so, so soft and the color is beautiful. However, it has permanent 'wrinkles' in it. I've washed it, hung it to dry. No help. I've washed it, dried it on delicate (so as not to shrink it). No help. I've used "wrinkle release". No help. A few of us Moms ordered the same shirt so we could have it personalized with our player's name and number. I think mine is the only one with this issue so it could just be a fluke. If it were black, you'd probably never see the differences in coloration but because it's the light purple, you can. I went ahead with the personalization (because I thought I could wash the wrinkles out) so I'm keeping it and will wear it. But just FYI...if you get one that appears to be wrinkled, I'd return it.
It’s a cute shirt, and super soft. However, it is no where near oversized. I usually wear a 2x, so that’s what I ordered. It fits very snug. I’m 5’8”, 260, and usually wear a 2x top.

I bout a size down because a lot of reviews said it runs big.. I does not! It's true to size. I ordered such. Thinking it would be big. It isn't. I should have ordered my natural size. I'm a regular woman's 12. Which in this chart is a large. XL(what I normally wear in if I want a loose fit ) says this is a 14-16. Normal XL is a 12 in America. So I ordered a Large. It fits more like a medium. So go by your regular size. If you're a large.. order a large and so on.
Totally recommend. Will be wearing this one a lot.

I really, really love the way this sweatshirt feels it’s nice and soft, however, upon wearing it the first time areas that got rubbed any little bit, nodded up and so now I have fabric knots all along the arms and the waist of this sweatshirt.

I bought the apricot color I think it was. Ok nothing like pictured imo. It like a beige at best. Not a color I would ever buy. And I kid you not it’s feels like suede. It’s nice feeling don’t get me wrong, but I’m not sure I want to wear it. It’s definitely not a thick sweatshirt like I thought it looked. Not at all. I live in the south so ok for here but I used to live in Illinois and not ok for up there in winter. Unless this is drastically on sale I wouldn’t waste your money. When I purchase clothes on Amazon it’s hit or miss
I bought this sweater for my daughter and she loves it. It's cute, soft, and comfy with the cute zipper detail. It's not too heavy so it's a great fall piece. It runs true to size.
This product was soft but definitely very cheaply made. I sized up to a medium and it runs small. Do not recommend.

The color is OK; the fit is oversized, but feels frumpy, the stitching at the neckline is exaggerated at the end and I keep thinking I have something on my shirt (not in a good way).  Have not laundered yet, tbd, but plan to keep...not bad, but not a fav.

This is presented as a sweatshirt. It’s a heavy, long sleeve t-shirt at best. That being said, it is soft and comfortable. I’m an XL and it fits closer to a L. The zippers are attractive, but if you want a fit like the model in the photo, size up. Overall, it’s/fine/. I’m not underwhelmed— just sort of “whelmed”. This product is one reason I hate shopping online. You don’t get a good idea of the feel or fit until it’s in your hands, especially if the product is sized in China.
